subject: Fwd: A shipment from order #SSN1990 is on the way
description_text:
Hi,

I just received my order and the mounting brackets for the haptic feedback
pedals were not in the box, what can you do?

Thanks
Kyle

conversations.body_text: Hi Kyle Robertson,  Please take a photo of both sides of the foam padding inside the packaging so we can check whether the bracket is included.

Hi,

I have double checked, they are definitely not there.

Please see the attached pictures.

Thanks
Kyle

On Tue, 22 Jul 2025 at 03:06, support@simsonn.com 
Attachment(s) that exceed the 20 MB limit have been dropped. Please reach out to the sender.
Hi Kyle Robertson,  Please note that you were checking the pedal packaging — kindly check the packaging for the motor as well.

Hi,

The motors came in the same packaging with the pedals, as you can see in
the box!

I have everything including the cable management for the motors and screws.

I just don’t have the pedal mounts.

Thanks
Kyle

On Tue, 22 Jul 2025 at 06:08, support@simsonn.com
Hi Kyle Robertson,  We will send you 3 replacement motor brackets today. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding and support.

Ok thank you for your response and support.

Thanks
Kyle

On Tue, 22 Jul 2025 at 06:14, support@simsonn.com
